title: FREE soccer demo class on Friday October 30th for ages 12 months through to 3 years old in Walnut Cr
text:
FREE soccer demo class on Friday October 30th for ages 12 months through to 3 years old in Walnut Cr Where 
301 N San Carlos Dr Walnut Creek, CA 
9:30 a.m. Friday, Oct. 30, 2015 Categories 
Events, Sports Join us for a free soccer demo class on Friday October 30th for ages 12 months through to 3 years old in Walnut Creek! *ABOUT SUPER SOCCER STARS SOCCER PROGRAMS:* Super Soccer Stars teaches soccer skills in a fun, non-competitive and educational environment. Through an age-specific curriculum, soccer is used to nurture, build self-confidence and develop teamwork. Low child-to-coach ratios and positive reinforcement ensure that each child improves at his or her own pace while having a blast! *ABOUT KICK & PLAY (12-24MONTH):* Kick & Play is a parent-child pre-soccer and movement program specifically designed for toddlers between 12 and 24 months. Our experienced instructors along with our puppet friends, Mimi & Pepe, take you and your little one through a world of exciting physical activity. Individual attention, positive reinforcement, and engaging original music help to develop pre-soccer skills that will have your toddler learning to balance, run, kick and play – all while having a blast! FREE DEMO SCHEDULE: Heather Farm Sports Fields – FIELD #1 Fri 30-Oct-15 09:30 AM - 10:10 AM: 12 - 24 months (Kick & Play) 10:20 AM - 11:00 AM: 2 - 3 yrs 11:10 AM - 11:50 AM: 12 - 24 months (Kick & Play)
